cluster_classes.class_description: Standards and codes related to the construction and inspection of pressure vessels in various industries.

members.entity_description: Rules for construction of pressure vessels.

cluster_classes.class_description: A collection of standards and guidelines for assessing equipment integrity, risk, and safe operation in industrial settings.
cluster_classes.evidence_excerpt: Standards for equipment integrity, risk, and safe operation.

members.entity_description: Fitness-For-Service standard for assessing the integrity of equipment.
Risk-Based Inspection - Base Resource Document for risk assessment.
Guidelines for the safe operation of hydrofluoric acid alkylation units.
Guidelines for corrosion control in hydroprocessing reactor effluent air cooler systems.
Requirements for materials and fabrication of heavy wall pressure vessels for high temperature and pressure service.
Standard for steels used in hydrogen service at elevated temperatures and pressures.
Guidelines for avoiding environmental cracking in amine units.

cluster_classes.class_description: A series of reference volumes providing comprehensive information on metals, including properties, corrosion, and failure analysis.
cluster_classes.evidence_excerpt: ASM Metals Handbook volumes cover properties, corrosion, and failure analysis.

members.entity_description: Reference for properties and selection of iron, steels, and high-performance alloys.
Reference for corrosion in petroleum refining and petrochemical operations.
Reference for failure analysis and prevention.

cluster_classes.class_description: Publications focused on corrosion in the petrochemical industry, providing guidelines and analysis.
cluster_classes.evidence_excerpt: Focus on corrosion in petrochemical operations.

members.entity_description: Reference for corrosion in petroleum refining and petrochemical operations.
Manual on corrosion in the petrochemical industry.

cluster_classes.class_description: ASTM publications providing specialized studies and manuals on material behavior and industry practices.
cluster_classes.evidence_excerpt: ASTM manuals and studies on material behavior.

members.entity_description: Manual on corrosion in the petrochemical industry.
Study on thermo-mechanical fatigue behavior of materials.

cluster_classes.class_description: Methods used to inspect materials for defects without causing damage, including radiographic, ultrasonic, visual, and magnetic particle testing.
cluster_classes.evidence_excerpt: Methods in the FOCUS chunk for detecting defects.

members.entity_description: A non-destructive testing method using X-rays or gamma rays to view the internal structure of a component.
An ultrasonic testing method using shear waves to detect flaws in materials.
A non-destructive testing method using high-frequency sound waves to detect internal flaws.
A non-destructive testing method involving the visual examination of a component.
A non-destructive testing method using fluorescent particles to detect surface and near-surface defects.

cluster_classes.class_description: Standards providing guidelines and rules for construction and assessment in engineering applications.
cluster_classes.evidence_excerpt: Standards for construction and assessment in engineering.

members.entity_description: Standard for Shell and Tube Heat Exchangers used in general refinery service.

members.entity_name: ASME Boiler and Pressure Vessel Code Section III
members.entity_description: Rules for construction of nuclear power plant components.
Guidance on methods for assessing the acceptability of flaws in fusion welded structures.

cluster_classes.class_description: A specific report detailing fitness-for-service evaluation procedures for pressure vessels, tanks, and piping.

members.entity_description: Fitness-For-Service evaluation procedures for operating pressure vessels, tanks, and piping.

args.new_description: Comprehensive standards and codes for construction, inspection, integrity assessment, and safe operation of equipment and structures in engineering and industrial settings.
args.justification: All three classes group standards and codes for construction, inspection, and assessment in engineering/industrial contexts, with overlapping scope and no clear separation; merging eliminates redundancy and clarifies schema.
Assigns a clear, domain-appropriate Class_Group connecting standards and reference materials relevant to engineering and industry.

args.new_description: Reference handbooks, manuals, and publications providing technical information on metals, corrosion, failure analysis, and material behavior for engineering applications.
args.justification: These classes all contain reference materials (ASM, ASTM, corrosion) used for technical guidance in engineering; entity overlap (e.g., ASM Vol 13, ASTM MNL41) and similar scope justify merging.
Assigns the same Class_Group as the merged standards class, reflecting their close relationship in engineering technical documentation.
Assigns a clear, domain-appropriate Class_Group for inspection and testing methods, distinct from standards and reference materials.

args.new_description: Reports detailing fitness-for-service evaluation procedures for pressure vessels, tanks, and piping.
args.justification: Renames and reclassifies the class for clarity, and assigns it to the same Class_Group as standards and reference materials due to its technical evaluation focus.

executed_decisions.justification: All three classes group standards and codes for construction, inspection, and assessment in engineering/industrial contexts, with overlapping scope and no clear separation; merging eliminates redundancy and clarifies schema.
Assigns a clear, domain-appropriate Class_Group connecting standards and reference materials relevant to engineering and industry.
These classes all contain reference materials (ASM, ASTM, corrosion) used for technical guidance in engineering; entity overlap (e.g., ASM Vol 13, ASTM MNL41) and similar scope justify merging.
Assigns the same Class_Group as the merged standards class, reflecting their close relationship in engineering technical documentation.
Assigns a clear, domain-appropriate Class_Group for inspection and testing methods, distinct from standards and reference materials.

executed_decisions.new_description: Reports detailing fitness-for-service evaluation procedures for pressure vessels, tanks, and piping.
executed_decisions.justification: Renames and reclassifies the class for clarity, and assigns it to the same Class_Group as standards and reference materials due to its technical evaluation focus.
